name: Cleanup On Aisle Infinity Demo
description:
Clean-up on Aisle Infinity is a first-person infinite survival brawler that places the player as a janitor at their local All-Mart, tasked with guiding souls who have gotten lost in the department store into the afterlife. This is no small task however, as these shoppers have some unfinished business, be it infinite Black Friday deals or searching for the ever elusive restrooms. Players must use the tools found within the different departments to fend off the capitalistic hordes and not-so-peacefully send these shoppers to the next life

Credits: Tyler Gentry - Systems Programmer / 2D Artist Carl Maulfair - 3D Artist / Level Design Leith Reardon - AI Programmer / Sound Dante Mancinelli - Music Composer Leo Gehrman - 2D Artist Tess Dalton - 2D Artist
